首页 < 产业布局 < 多层支撑 < 商业贸易

重庆海领齐力机械设备有限公司   全资子公司

Chongqing Hailing Qili Machinery Equipment Co., Ltd.   Wholly-owned subsidiary

海领齐力是一家专业的采销服装公司，年采销额1亿元以上，采销业务贯穿西南，辐射全国。
公司已与多家大型国有上市企业建立稳定的合作关系。以专业化的采销水平，为客户快捷，系统的输出质优，价格优惠的产品。
Hailing Qili is a professional clothing purchase and sales company with an annual sales amount of over 100 million yuan. The purchase and sales businesses run through the southwest and spread across the country.
The company has established stable cooperative relations with many large state-owned listed companies. With professional purchase and sales, it can quickly and systematically provide high-quality products with preferential price for customers.
TEL/  86/23/86914297
